item.title: Civic Stories - December 2012
item.description: I sort of miss being in the backseat. A lot of my goofing off years have been conducted within the confines of the passenger doors, backside of the front seats, and the backseat.

item.title: Kysa Knows
item.description: Well here are a couple of shots of our princess, who was trying to finish off her purchases so she can brush teeth and sleep already.

item.title: After a busy afternoon of play, Ate Kysa attended to her brother and shared a meal with him.
item.description: via Gravity Comments: You’re so lucky Miguel. Cute ka na, may ate ka… Anonymous - May 6, 2010You’re so lucky Miguel.
